alert.note: Alert for Baker County (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 03 at 1:39AM PDT until November 04 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulation up to 10 inches, except 15 to 25 inches above 7000 feet. Up to 3 inches may fall as low as 3500 feet before changing to rain Friday morning. The snow level will rise to near 7000 feet late Friday. * WHERE...Baker County including Baker City and the Interstate 84 corridor in and around the Baker Valley. * WHEN...From this evening through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, including over the passes along Interstate 84.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
